name: A Vicious Reception
effect:
Counter Permanent (3)

effect: Effect: You can search for 1 "Orochimaru" Ninja card in your Deck, show it to your opponent and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.

effect:
Sound | Male | Sea Monster | Medical | Mental Power: 2

effect:

Leaf | Jonin | Male

Permanent

effect:
Requirements: "Itachi Uchiha"
Effect: Select a card type. Then, look at all the cards in your opponent's hand and return all the cards of the selected type to the bottom of their original owner's Deck.
"And twenty-four hours from now... you'll be weaker still."

name: Tsunade
effect:
Leaf | Sannin | Female | Medical | Growth | Mental Power: 3
[UNRIVALED STRENGTH]
When this Ninja's Team wins an Outstanding Victory, or an Outstanding Battle Reward, your opponent must discard the top 4 cards of their Deck.
"Say what?"

name: Under a Starry Sky
effect:
Target:X number of the cards in your Discard Pile
Effect: Return the target to the top of their original owner's Deck in any order you like. X = the number of your in-play "Leaf + Genin" Ninjas.
"You know..."

name: Unexpected Result
effect: Effect: Search for 1 "Gamatatsu" or 1 "Gamakichi" Ninja card in your Deck and put it in play. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"Hi, long time no see. Got some candies for me?" "Why you guys all the time?"

name: Unguarded Moment
effect:
Target: 1 of your Jutsu cards being used with "Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user"
Effect: The target cannot be affected by your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn.
"Huh? She let her guard down..."

name: Universal Assimilation Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Itinerant Ninja"
Target: User
Effect: The target cannot receive any Damage during this turn. However, your opponent can negate this effect by discarding 1 card with an "Earth" symbol from their hand.
"Does he take the properties of rock in his body?"

name: Visitors from the Darkness
effect: Effect: During this turn, you can deploy 1 non-"Leaf" Ninja in addition to the regular deployment of a Ninja.
"It's getting interesting, isn't it?"

name: Wanted Poster with a Reward
effect: Effect: If the value of your Turn Marker is 5 or less, draw 2 cards. If the value is 6 or more, select 1 of the cards in your opponent's hand at random and discard it.
"What's this? ...A wanted poster?"

name: Water Style: Furious Current Jutsu
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas with an Entrance cost of X or less
Effect: Return the target to the bottom of its original owner's Deck. You can only discard Chakras with a "Water" symbol for X.
"I'm going to unleash all the Chakra I've absorbed!"

name: Water Style: Giant Vortex Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Jonin" or higher Rank
Target: Every Stand-By Ninja in 1 of your opponent's Teams
Effect: Move the target back to its original owner's hand. This effect is negated if the user's Team is not opposed.
"Water Jutsu: Giant Vortex Jutsu!!!"

name: Water Style: Great Cannonball Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Sea Monster"
Target: 1 Ninja being sent out to Battle
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-by Ninja.
"Eat this!"

name: Weight Training
effect:
Permanent (2)
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Place a -3/-3 coin on the target. When this Mission card is removed from play, that -3/-3 coin is changed to +3/+3 coin. (If you attach this card to your opponent's card, they control this card.)
"Fairly basic training equipment..."

name: World of Genjutsu
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: Any Ninja without the "Genjutsu" Combat Attribute cannot be the user of Jutsu cards with a Jutsu cost of 2 or more. (Each specific symbol in the Jutsu cost also counts as 1.)
Genjutsu: It drags the target to the world of illusion where their spirit and body gets exhausted and deranged.

name: Wounds from the Lost Battle
effect:
Permanent
Effect: When either player wins 1 or more Battle Rewards, the other player must discard 1 of the cards in their hand at the end of that turn.
"You must get some rest!"

name: Yoroi Akado
effect:
Sound | Male
[IMPROVED ABSORPTION JUTSU]
If this Ninja is sent out to Attack and opposed, it gets the following effect during the turn: "Valid: At the end of the turn, if this Ninja is in your Village, you can select and discard up to the same number of your opponent's Chakras as their Ninjas that were sent out to Block this Ninja's Team this turn."
"I'm different from that time!"

name: Youths of the Land of Fire
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: When you deploy a "Leaf" Ninja, place 1 Growth coin on that Ninja.
Ninja of the Land of Fire, where leaves shine vibrantly. Their determination to love and protect their village creates unity and fosters their abilities as true Ninjas.

name: Youths of the Land of Wind
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: When you deploy a "Sand" Ninja, place 1 Growth coin on that Ninja.
Ninja of the Land of Wind, where sandstorms occur frequently. The harsh environment sharpens their senses, helping them to be elite Ninjas.
